name: places/ChIJB4N6jihZwokRELl9oAkNTuQ
adrFormatAddress: 685 1st Ave., New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Love coming to to meet with Melanie, Chris and Malia, such a professional and knowledgeable team. Loved the tour they provided and service! If you're ever in the market for a new condo, come see them and experience the amazing service they provide and the gorgeous condos they have to show.

text.text: Love coming to to meet with Melanie, Chris and Malia, such a professional and knowledgeable team. Loved the tour they provided and service! If you're ever in the market for a new condo, come see them and experience the amazing service they provide and the gorgeous condos they have to show.

originalText.text:
I rented in the building for a little over two years.

Amenities esp. for remote work, the apt. were more spacious than like properties at the same $, building manager (Peter) was helpful and v. Responsive. Great if you like clean lines and minimal design.

Would have liked food deliveries to be brought up to apt. Vs. Picking up from a table in lobby.  Overall, my issue with my time in the building was less about the actual building but more about the unfriendly and overall rude tenants that it attracted over time.

originalText.text: Will give them 0 star if I can. The manager Peter was extremely rude and raciest. They don't help residents to solve problems，instead，they are rather defensive and hostile，tring to getting rid of their responsibilities by trying to blaming residents for other issues not caused by residents.

text.text: Will give them 0 star if I can. The manager Peter was extremely rude and raciest. They don't help residents to solve problems，instead，they are rather defensive and hostile，tring to getting rid of their responsibilities by trying to blaming residents for other issues not caused by residents.

originalText.text:
Absolutely the worst apartment on the earth. I am deeply appalled by the shocking and reprehensible behavior I experienced under the management of Peter. It is with utmost disappointment that I write this Google review to shed light on the disturbing incidents of racial discrimination and verbal abuse I endured during my tenancy.

From the moment I moved in, I noticed a clear pattern of racial discrimination displayed by the apartment manager Peter. His action and words was filled with an unsettling bias that created an unwelcome and hostile environment. It is truly disheartening to witness such blatant disregard for equality and respect in this day and age.

In addition to the racism, the apartment manager Peter consistently used vulgar and offensive language towards me and other tenants. The derogatory remarks and profanities directed at us were not only unprofessional but also deeply hurtful. As paying tenants, we should be treated with dignity and courtesy, not subjected to such degrading and unacceptable behavior.

It is deeply concerning that a person in a managerial position, who should be setting an example for professionalism and fairness, instead chooses to engage in such despicable conduct. This behavior not only tarnishes the reputation of the apartment complex but also undermines the sense of safety and well-being that residents should expect in their own homes.

I strongly urge the management team to take immediate and decisive action against this apartment manager. Racism and verbal abuse should never be tolerated under any circumstances. It is imperative that the management team addresses this issue seriously, conducts a thorough investigation, and takes appropriate measures to rectify the situation and prevent it from recurring in the future.

I want to emphasize that no individual should have to endure such distressing treatment. As members of the community, we have a responsibility to speak out against injustice and hold those accountable who perpetuate discrimination and offensive behavior.

I sincerely hope that my review serves as a wake-up call for the management team to address these grave concerns promptly and take the necessary steps to create a safe, inclusive, and respectful living environment for all residents.

originalText.text:
The staff lacks training and quality, has a bad attitude and always suspects that I am not a resident here
There is still a time limit for the package, and always return my things without my consent at all.
I spend so much money every month, it's really pathetic to support these people
Especially an old white man would make things difficult
